patthana8.47:1.1: Naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.47:2.1: Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.47:3.1: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.47:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
